TalkedToNpc.description: Satisfied when the player opens a dialog with the specified NPC.

InputNpc.description: Satisfied when the player clicks a dialog link with the specified input ID. Use with AddNpcInput().

KilledNpcs.description: Satisfied when the player has killed the specified amount of NPCs.

KilledPlayers.description: Satisfied when the player has killed the specified amount of players in PK zones.

GotItems.description: Satisfied when the player has the specified amount of items in their inventory.

LostItems.description: Satisfied if player loses required items. Use after GotItems() to verify they still have items.

Rolled.description: Satisfied if the player rolls value.

UsedItem.description: Satisfied when the player has used the specified item the required number of times.

EnterCoord.description: Satisfied when the player stands on the specified map coordinates.

LeaveCoord.description: Satisfied when the player leaves the specified map coordinates.

EnterMap.description: Satisfied when the player enters the specified map.

LeaveMap.description: Satisfied when the player leaves the specified map.

IsClass.description: Satisfied if the player's class matches the specified class ID.

IsRace.description: Satisfied if the player's race matches the specified race ID.

IsGender.description: Satisfied if the player's gender matches the specified ID (0=male, 1=female).

CitizenOf.description: Satisfied if the player is a citizen of the specified home town.

GotSpell.description: Satisfied when the player has learned the specified spell.

LostSpell.description: Satisfied if player does not have a spell.

UsedSpell.description: Satisfied when the player has cast the specified spell the required number of times.

IsWearing.description: Satisfied if the player has the specified item equipped.

StatGreater.description: Satisfied if the player's stat is above the specified value: CON, level, class, admin, etc..

StatLess.description: Satisfied if the player's stat is below the specified value: CON, level, class, admin, etc..

StatIs.description: Satisfied if the player's stat is exactly the specified value: CON, level, class, admin, etc..

StatNot.description: Satisfied if the player's stat is not the specified value: CON, level, class, admin, etc..

StatBetween.description: Satisfied if the player's stat is between the specified values: CON, level, class, admin, etc..

StatRpn.description: Satisfied if the player's stats match the formula.

DoneDaily.description: Rule satisfied if quest is completed x times in 1 day.
